name: S.H.O.U.T. - 2 Hour Challenge
description:
NOTE: Sadly, Unity's microphone package does not allow exporting to WebGL. I've replaced it with a simple movement script with left/right or A/D keys for this demo. See the livestream VOD for the actual project result!

A game made on stream for a 2-hour game dev challenge!

"A space asteroids game but it's controlled entirely by your voice."

Check out the stream for more: https://www.twitch.tv/jadenbalogh
